items.summary: Update `frontend/src/components/LandModel.tsx` material initialization so each biome’s mesh gets its own specific `emissiveIntensity` value set first (e.g., Snow = 2.0, Plains = 1.3), and only after that, persist the per-mesh baseline with `child.material.userData.baseEmissive = child.material.emissiveIntensity` (so the baseline remains unique per biome/mesh).

Refine the emissive pulse in `frontend/src/components/LandModel.tsx` so the `useFrame` loop uses `group.current.traverse(...)` and sets `material.emissiveIntensity = material.userData.baseEmissive * pulse` for any traversed mesh whose material has `userData.baseEmissive` defined, ensuring the pulse scales each biome’s unique baseline rather than overwriting it.

Ensure dithering is applied to all land mesh materials during the same material setup traversal in `frontend/src/components/LandModel.tsx` (i.e., `child.material.dithering = true` for every mesh material processed).
